metadata.title: CVE-2023-51714 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the HTTP2 implementation in Qt before 5.15.17,6.x before 6.2.11, 6.3.x through 6.5.x before 6.5.4, and 6.6.x before6.6.2. network/access/http2/hpacktable.cpp has an incorrect HPack integeroverflow check.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
